text: Muricauda olearia is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Muricauda which has been isolated from seawater which was contaminated with crude oil from the west coast of Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Muricauda olearia at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * * Category:Flavobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2009
title: Muricauda olearia
